imdb.plot outline: History is important because it allows us to understand our past, which in turn allows to understand our present for our future generations. However, we won't know the truth if we continue to believe the lies of our past. The mission of this documentary series to preserve our important history while revealing tribulations and errors to help improve on better society for our future generations.
